LocationUnavailable.title: Enable your Location
LocationUnavailable.text: The app requires access to your location to recommend routes and calculate fares.

LocationLoading.title: Location loading...
LocationLoading.text: The app is retrieving your location from the browser. This might take a moment.

signin.passwordError: Please input a valid password(At least 8 characters)
signin.emailError: Please input a valid email address

signup.passwordError: Please input a valid password(At least 8 characters)
signup.emailError: Please input a valid email address

RideEvaluationModal.title: Evaluate Ride
RideEvaluationModal.text-rating-1: This ride is not recommended. It will be very difficult to find a new passenger near the destination.
RideEvaluationModal.text-rating-2: This ride is below average. It will be difficult to find a new passenger near the destination.
RideEvaluationModal.text-rating-3: This ride is average. It will take a bit of time to find a new passenger near the destination.
RideEvaluationModal.text-rating-4: This ride is above average. It will be easy to find a new passenger near the destination.
RideEvaluationModal.text-rating-5: This ride is ideal! It will be very easy to find a new passenger near the destination.

BreakReminderModal.title: Take a break!
BreakReminderModal.text: You’ve been driving for more than 3 hours without a break! We recommend that you take a short 15 minute break.

StartBreakModal.title: Take a break!
StartBreakModal.text: How long would you like to take a break for?

NoRouteFoundModal.title: No Route
NoRouteFoundModal.text: No route was found to your specified destination.

UnknownLocationModal.title: Unknown Destination
UnknownLocationModal.text: The location you specified could not be found. The route cannot be displayed.

RouteErrorModal.title: Internal Error
RouteErrorModal.text: An unknown error occurred. The route cannot be displayed.

profile.signOutWarning: Are you sure you want to sign out?
profile.deleteAccountWarning: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
